pages.text: Originally bred to herd and protect flocks of sheep, German Shepherds are loyal dogs now often used in various lines of work.$(br2)Standing at roughly a block tall, these valiant dogs come in four different coats.
These dogs are most commonly found in various forest biomes. They can also be found in plains, and more rarely in meadows.
pages.title: Location
Taming
pages.text: These dogs can be tamed with a Mutton Treat.
